fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Secretly swap two players' player list numbers during the night.
- Secretly shuffle all players' player list numbers during the day. 1 Use

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Swapping player numbers does NOT swap visits towards them, only effects involving 'neighbor' mechanics.
- After all roles are rolled/rerolled, check if there are any that involved 'neighbor' mechanics, or otherwise ones that rely on player numbers. If none are present, automatically reroll this role.
